page.title: 08EDUCATION-SCHOOL CLUBS
page.content: Parents and teachers organise clubs during lunch times and after school. We have a choice of art, maths, folk, rounders, gym, dance, swimming, cricket, football and netball.At art club we go out and find something to draw. We make Christmas, Birthday and Easter cards, we draw still life. At maths club we make mathamatical things, play board games, do puzzles, use calculator skills and do curve stitching. At folk club you play guitars and sing songs. At gym club we do B.A.G.A. badges and at the end of that year we have a gym competition. At dance club we dance to Fame and Country dances. At swimming club the mums take us upto the local swimming baths and an instructor gives us swimming coaching.
